description: This file defines an Angular component named RegisterAnalystComponent which handles the registration form for analysts, including form validation, UI layout, and submission logic for real or mock backend interactions.

classes.name: RegisterAnalystComponent
classes.description: Component for analyst registration with form fields, validation, and submission handling.

methods.name: acceptInvalid

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, including validation, simulated or real API calls, and navigation upon success.
